Hero Autoplay.details: Video should autoplay on page load

Holographic Overlays.details: Overlays should animate in after video loads

Header Scroll Behavior.details: Header should transition from transparent to white on scroll

Login Card Interactions.details: Login cards should have hover effects and be clickable

Header Scroll Behavior.details: Header should transition from transparent to white on scroll

Login Card Interactions.details: Login cards should have hover effects and be clickable

Hero Autoplay.details: Video should autoplay on page load

Holographic Overlays.details: Overlays should animate in after video loads

Header Scroll Behavior.details: Header should transition from transparent to white on scroll

Login Card Interactions.details: Login cards should have hover effects and be clickable

Poster Fallback.details: Poster image should show before video loads

Playsinline Behavior.details: Video should play inline without fullscreen

Stacked Login Cards.details: Login cards should stack vertically on mobile

Poster Fallback.details: Poster image should show before video loads

Playsinline Behavior.details: Video should play inline without fullscreen

Stacked Login Cards.details: Login cards should stack vertically on mobile

Tab Through Login Cards.details: All login cards should be focusable with Tab key

CTA Button Focus.details: CTA buttons should be focusable and have visible focus indicators

Enter/Space Activation.details: Login cards should activate with Enter or Space key

ARIA Labels.details: All interactive elements should have proper ARIA labels

Semantic HTML.details: Page should use proper semantic HTML elements

Skip to Content.details: Skip to content link should be available for keyboard users

ARIA Labels.details: All interactive elements should have proper ARIA labels

Semantic HTML.details: Page should use proper semantic HTML elements

Skip to Content.details: Skip to content link should be available for keyboard users

CSS Media Query.details: Animations should be reduced when prefers-reduced-motion is set

JavaScript Detection.details: JavaScript should detect reduced motion preference and adjust animations

Animation Duration.details: Animation durations should be reduced to 0.01s when reduced motion is preferred

Poster Display.details: Poster image should show immediately while video loads

Graceful Video Loading.details: Video should load gracefully without blocking the UI

Fallback Behavior.details: Should show play button if autoplay fails
